parameters.name: ExeConfig
parameters.description: The executed mode of a playbook. The value is a JSON array.

parameters.name: InputParams
parameters.description: The configuration of the input parameters. The value is a JSON array.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response.

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: OutputParams
parameters.description: The configuration of the output parameters. This parameter is unavailable. Leave it empty.

parameters.name: PlaybookUuid
parameters.description:
The UUID of the playbook.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~)operation to query the playbook UUID.
